questionAnswers.question: What are the key takeaways from your session?
questionAnswers.answer: Understanding the risks of autonomous AI systems in production. Learning best practices for securing agentic workflows. Implementing proper access controls and audit trails for AI agents.

sessions.title: Securing Autonomous AI Workflows: Lessons from the Field
sessions.description:
Autonomous AI systems are revolutionizing how we build and deploy software, but they also introduce new security risks. This session shares real-world experiences and lessons learned from securing AI-driven automation.

Topics covered:

- Common security pitfalls in AI automation
- Access control strategies for autonomous systems
- Audit and compliance considerations
- Incident response for AI system compromises

Learn from actual implementation experiences and discover strategies for maintaining security while embracing AI automation.
